queries.title: Cases by report date range
queries.template: SELECT Case.*, IIF(Case.SEX =1 , 'Male',  'Female') AS Gender,Address.Lat,Address.StreetAddress,Address.Lng FROM Case,Address where Case.DbID=Address.Case_DbID and REPORT_DT >= #$1# AND REPORT_DT <= #$2#

queries.title: Cases by simple comparison
queries.template: SELECT Case.*, IIF(Case.SEX =1 , 'Male',  'Female') AS Gender, Address.Lat,Address.StreetAddress,Address.Lng FROM Case,Address where Case.DbID=Address.Case_DbID where $1 $2 '$3'
